title: Pixel 4 xl A10 wi fi share doesn't work
content:
Pixel 4 xl, android 10 last build.
Wi fi share doesn't work. 
Yesterday I couldn't connect to my wifi hotspot on my PC (win10) either it said 'cant connect' or very rarely "connected, no internet" i thought it was something with windows so I tried some troubleshooting there with no success. But I could still connect to hotspot with my laptop. 
Now today my laptop also have similar symptoms :/ as my PC so I'm pretty sure it's either due to android 10 or due to pixel.
(I will mention here that if I connect my phone to pc via cable and enable usb thethering then everything works fine, can't check if it also works this way on laptop since I have only usb-c usb-c cable and only my PC have type-c slot on the motherboard)

I've tried using safe mode, 2.4,5ghz, with or without password but that didn't helped.

Update to android 11 is not an option here as well as factory reset.

[Edit] my other android phone could connect but says "no internet"
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
